DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether creatine associated or not to exercise training can improve physical performance in patients with knee osteoarthritis and fibromyalgia.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Creatine Supplementation in Women With Knee Osteoarthritis and Fibromyalgia
DOC.criteria: Fulfill ACR criteria of knee osteoarthritis Fulfill ACR criteria of fibromyalgia Athletes Drugs stable for at least three months before entering the study No limitations to resistance training
